one.question: How does Perfecto CV work?
one.answer: Our speciality is to analyse Job Descriptions. Our advanced Artifitial Intelligence looks for the important keywords and adds/suggests them for your resume to pass automated screening systems.

two.question: How do Credits work in Perfecto CV?
two.answer: Credits are used to perform each action, i.e., creating or optimizing your Resume, which will cost credits. To view the Action Cost table, visit your Dashboard.

three.question: Can I change my plan later?
three.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

four.question: Is there a contract or long-term commitment?
four.answer: No, all plans are month-to-month with no long-term contract.

five.question: What payment methods do you accept?
five.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards.

six.question: Do you store my payment data?
six.answer: We NEVER store or interact with your payment data. Everything happens through Stripe Payments.

seven.question: Do you store my resume data?
seven.answer: We store your profile data securely and never share it with third parties. You can delete your account and all data at any time.

whatIsAts.title: Understanding ATS
whatIsAts.subtitle: What is an Applicant Tracking System?
whatIsAts.whatIs: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is a software used by recruiters and employers to manage job applications and filter candidates.
whatIsAts.affects: How ATS Affects Your Job Search

bulletPoints.1: • Over 75% of large companies use ATS to screen resumes before a human sees them.
bulletPoints.2: • ATS scans your resume for keywords and ranks candidates based on match percentage.
bulletPoints.3: • Poorly formatted resumes or missing keywords get automatically rejected.
bulletPoints.4: • Perfecto CV helps you optimize your resume specifically for ATS requirements and stand out for human recruiters.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Perfecto CV ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our resume-building application.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollected.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
informationCollected.personalInfo: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, work history, education details, and other resume-related information you provide.
informationCollected.usageData: Usage Data: How you interact with our app, including templates used, time spent, and features accessed.
informationCollected.technicalData: Technical Data: browser type, device information, and operating system such as the device language to auto detect the Perfecto CV language.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUse.improveApp: Improve our app and develop new features
howWeUse.communicate: Communicate with you about updates and offers

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.accessInfo: Access, update, or delete your personal information
yourRights.requestCopy: Request a copy of your data

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
